rukus.text: 32|2|E'i kitaba srstijagatara pratipalakara taraphara paraa aratirna, iyata kono sandeha na'i.

32|3|Athaba sihamte e'i katha kaya neki ye, ‘e'ito te'om nije'i racana karaiche’? Nahaya, baram eya tomara pratipalakara taraphara paraa aha satya, yate tumi enekuraa eta sampradayaka satarka karaiba paraa, yisakalara ocarata tomara purbe ana kono satarkakarai aha na'i, sambharata sihamte hidayata labha karaiba.

32|4|Allahe'i se'i satta, yijane akasasamuha, prthirai arau e'i duyora madhyararti sakalo bastu kerala chaya dinata srsti karaiche. Tara pichata te'om arachara oparata uthiche. Te'omra bahirae tomalokara ana kono abhibharaka na'i arau kono madhyastatakarai'o na'i, tathapi'o tomaloke upadesa grahana nakaraiba ne
32|5|teraemi akasara paraa prthirai laike sakalo bisaya paraicalana karae, tara pichata seya edina te'omra ocaralaike uthiba, yara paraimana ha’ba tomalokara ganana anusarae ehejara bachara.
32|6|Te'om gayeba arau upasthita (yaratiya bisayara) jnani, prabala paraakramasali, parama dayalu.
32|7|Yijane te'omra pratyekato srstika srjana karaiche uttamaraupe arau boka matira paraa manara srstira sucana karaiche.
32|8|Tara pichata teraemi manuhara bansa utpanna karaiche tuccha tarala padarthara upadanara paraa.

32|9|Tara pichata teraemi taka suthama karaiche arau tata te'omra rauha phumraa'i diche. Teraemi tomalokara babe kana, caku arau antahkarana srsti karaiche. Tomaloke khube'i kama krtajnata prakasa karaa.
32|10|Arau sihamte kaya, ‘ami yetiya matita mihali yama tara pichato ami natuna srstiraupe ut'thita hamane’? Baram sihamte nija pratipalakara saksataka asbikara karae.
32|11|Koraa, ‘tomalokara babe'i niyoga karaa haiche mrtyura phiraista teraemi tomalokara praana harana karaiba. Tara pichata tomalokara pratipalakara ocarate'i tomalokaka ubhata'i niya ha’ba’.
